 You are evaluating Chinese-to-English Machine translation task. The correct translation is "I told my friends: when the rebels call you a fifty-cent and when the leftist call you a rightist dog, they prove we are on the correct track in the middle!". The model generated translation is "I tell my friends this: When the anti-thief scolds you for five hairs, when the left scolds your right dog, it just proves that our middle way is correct!". Please identify all errors within each model output, up to a maximum of five. For each error, please give me the corresponding error type, major/minor label, error location of the model generated translation and explanation for the error. Major errors can confuse or mislead the reader due to significant change in meaning, while minor errors don't lead to loss of meaning but will be noticed.Your Translation contains 4 errors:
Error type 1: Incorrect translation has stylistic problems
Major/minor: Major
Error location 1: "anti-thief" and "five hairs"
Explanation for error 1: "anti-thief" is not the same as "thief" and "five hairs" is not the same as "five fingers." This changes the meaning of the original text.
Error type 2: Incorrect translation includes information not present in the correct translation
Major/minor: Major
Error location 2: "left" and "right dog"
Explanation for error 2: The translation introduces "left" and "right dog," which are not present in the correct translation. The correct translation refers to "leftist" and "rightist."
Error type 3: Incorrect translation does not accurately represent the correct translation
Major/minor: Major
Error location 3: "our middle way"
Explanation for error 3: "our middle way" does not accurately represent "their middle way." The correct translation refers to "their middle way."
Error type 4: Wrong grammatical register (eg, inappropriately informal pronouns). Internal inconsistency (not related to terminology)
Major/minor: Major
Error location 4: "it just proves"
Explanation for error 4: "it just proves" is an informal and incorrect way to express the idea of "indicating that."
